labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Latest 64 bit Firefox on Windows 8 and 10
data.expected_result: File selection dialogue pops up and allows uploading of emoji
data.short_description: Upload Emoji button not working on Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Have permission to edit emojis on the server - Open server settings panel - Click over to Emoji panel - Click on Upload Emoji button
